profile.name: Tiny Tales
profile.position: Co-founder & CEO at Terribly Tiny Tales

posts.title: A Changing World Order
posts.content: The world order was shifting due to the rise of emerging economies like China, technological advancements, and geopolitical tensions, while challenges such as climate change and global health crises emphasized the need for international cooperation and adaptation of alliances.

posts.title: India v/s Australia
posts.content: India and Australia, two cricket powerhouses, engaged in intense matches marked by competitive spirit and skill, contributing to the dynamic and passionate landscape of international cricket.

posts.title: Write to build
posts.content: writing is the first step to create
